thread.title: Honors Korina Bross of First Centennial Mortgage with the Mortgage Professional
thread.title_full: Five Star Professional Honors Korina Bross of First Centennial Mortgage with the 2015 Five Star Mortgage Professional Award

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Honors Korina Bross of First Centennial Mortgage with the Mortgage Professional
text:
“My passion is helping families finance their dream homes. I focus on residential lending, both purchases and refinances, and my clients range from first-time homebuyers, current homeowners and move-up buyers, as well as investors. I work closely with my clients to find the best mortgage program to meet their individual needs, and one of the best parts of my job is calling a client to say ‘We are clear to close’!” says Korina Bross of First Centennial Mortgage. Five Star Professional is pleased to announce Korina Bross, First Centennial Mortgage , has been chosen as one of Chicago’s Five Star Mortgage Professionals for 2015.
 recognize a select group of Chicago area mortgage professionals who provide quality services to their clients. Less than 7 percent in the area were selected. Korina Bross is featured, along with other award winners, in a special section of the October issue.
“This is the second year in a row I have been selected for this award, and I am honored. It truly means the world to me. I value your trust in me and appreciate your past business and referrals,” says Korina Bross
of First Centennial Mortgage.
The Five Star Mortgage Professional award program is conducted in more than 30 markets throughout North America. Mortgage professionals are measured using an objective, in-depth research methodology with significant focus on customer feedback and overall satisfaction.
Korina Bross’
 homebuyers, along with real estate agents, to identify award candidates and measure their client satisfaction levels. Phone, mail and online respondents rate their mortgage professional on criteria such as overall satisfaction and referability. Qualifying candidates are then
